sense.def:
The end of a period of time, event, or piece of writing
je zadnji del obdobja, dogodka ali zapisa.

seg.quote: He urged an immediate end to all armed attacks.
She read the first draft from beginning to end.

sense.def:
The end of something
je tista točka nečesa, ki je najdlje od središča.

seg.quote: Sharpen a stick at both ends.
...at the other end of the social scale.

sense.def:
Kraj, od koder telefoniramo ali kamor potujemo, lahko imenujemo
the other end
.

seg.quote: The phone at the other end rang.

sense.def:
An end
je namen, za katerega nekaj storimo.

seg.quote: ...their use of industrial power for political ends.

sense.def:
One's end
je smrt nekega človeka;

seg.quote: He did not deserve such a cruel end.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
ends
ali kadar nekdo
ends something
, se nekaj konča.

seg.quote: He refused to end his nine-week-old hunger strike.
The play ends with all the children playing and reciting.
The trail ends one mile from Bakewell.

sense.def:
Kadar predmet
ends with or in something
, ima neko stvar na konici ali zadnjem koncu.

seg.quote: Each finger ends with a sharp claw.

sense.def:
To be at an end
pomeni biti končan.

Kadar nekaj
comes to an end
, se konča.

In the end
pomeni končno, po dolgem času.

seg.quote: She went back to England in the end.

sense.def:
To be an end in itself
pomeni, da je nekaj zaželeno, čeprav morda ničesar ne doseže.

Izraz
at the end of the day
uporabimo, če govorimo o nekem dejstvu, ki smo ga ugotovili, potem ko smo razmislili o vseh zadevnih podatkih.

seg.quote: The question at the end of the day is whether the house is actually worth that amount.

sense.def:
To make ends meet
pomeni imeti ravno še dovolj denarja za preživetje.

seg.quote: She had no end of trouble at school.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj dogaja
for days or weeks on end
, se več dni ali tednov nenehno dogaja.

xr.QF: get the wrong end of the stick:

sense.def:
To end up in a particular place or situation
pomeni biti na nekem kraju ali položaju po koncu dogodkov, čeprav tega nismo hoteli.

seg.quote: Many of their friends have ended up in prison.
We ended up taking a taxi there.
